channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump’s promised ‘Liberation Day’ of tariffs is coming. Here’s what it could mean for you
item.description: President Donald Trump says “Liberation Day” is coming. On Wednesday, he plans to roll out a set of tariffs that he promises will free the United States from foreign goods.

item.title: Trump roars down multiple paths of retribution as he vowed. Some targets yield while others fight
Wisconsin’s attorney general asks the state Supreme Court to stop Musk’s $1 million payments
